Вестник СВФУ

Научный журнал, периодическое издание, основан в 2004 г. Учредитель и издатель - Северо-Восточный федеральный университет имени М.К. Аммосова.

Where to get help

If you think you’ve found a bug in the Slate theme, please check the existing issues, and if no one has reported the problem, open a new issue.

If you have a general question about the theme, how to implement it, or how to customize it for your site you have two options:

  1. Search for your query on support.github.com, which will also look for similar topics on github.community
  2. Ask your question of the Jekyll community on talk.jekyllrb.com
  3. Contact GitHub Support

Вестник СВФУ maintained by escsvfu
